item.title: Bitcoin ETFs regain momentum with $507M inflows as BTC reclaims $68K
item.description: The fresh inflows lift US Bitcoin ETFs toward a potential first weekly gain after five consecutive weeks of outflows totaling $3.8 billion.

item.title: OCC proposal seeks to settle stablecoin yield debate, clearing way for CLARITY
item.description: The OCC‚Äôs proposal to implement the GENIUS Act would bar yield on payment stablecoins and introduce a rebuttable presumption against common issuer‚Äìaffiliate reward structures.

item.title: Whale loses $8.2M in leveraged ARC trade on Lighter
item.description: A massive leveraged long in the ARC perpetuals market collapsed on Lighter, triggering auto-deleveraging but limiting liquidity provider losses to about $75,000.

item.title: Deutsche Bank-backed AllUnity launches Swiss franc stablecoin CHFAU
item.description: Initially available to institutions via the AllUnity Mint Platform, CHFAU stablecoin launches under MiCA compliance after securing a license from the German regulator, BaFin.

item.title: Is XRP price setting up for a 20% bounce in March?
item.description: A convincing bullish reversal setup and hints of easing whale distribution may push the price of XRP up by 20% or more in March.

item.title: Sygnum launches service targeting $100B corporate crypto treasury market
item.description: The Swiss crypto bank will handle strategic asset allocation for corporate crypto treasuries and is already actively managing $200 million in volume at launch.

item.title: WLFI proposes governance staking system and USD1 usage incentives
item.description: World Liberty Financial‚Äôs USD1 is the fifth-largest stablecoin by market capitalization at $4.7 billion, while USDT is the market leader, followed by USDC.

item.title: OCC Lays Out Framework for Regulated Stablecoins Under GENIUS Act
item.description: The proposal details how banks, nonbanks and foreign issuers could operate stablecoins under U.S. banking supervision.

item.title: Bitwise: Wall Street bullish on crypto, investors remain skeptical
item.description: ‚ÄúThey‚Äôve heard the promises of institutional adoption for so long that they no longer register," said Bitwise's Matt Hougan.

item.title: Bitcoin touches $70,000 before fading as altcoins lead the strongest bounce in weeks
item.description: Ether, solana, and cardano all outpaced bitcoin on the day, suggesting a rotation into higher-beta tokens as forced selling from the February crash begins to clear.

item.title: Uniswap‚Äôs UNI jumps 15% as governance vote to expand fee switch gains momentum
item.description: A governance proposal would activate protocol fees across eight additional chains and automate fee collection on all v3 pools, potentially adding an estimated $27 Million in annualized revenue.

item.title: Blockchains may need 1B TPS to support AI agent future: Stripe
item.description: Stripe executives Patrick and John Collison expect blockchain network demands to increase significantly as adoption and use of AI agents grow in the future.

item.title: Buterin outlines 4-year roadmap to speed up and quantum-proof Ethereum
item.description: ‚ÄúThe goal is to decouple slots and finality, to allow us to reason about both separately,‚Äù explained Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin.

item.title: Aave surpasses $1T in lending volume amid institutional expansion
item.description: Aave continues to lead DeFi lending, with $27.2 billion in user value secured and $83.3 million in fees over the past 30 days, nearly four times more than its closest competitor.

item.title: ETHZilla shares rise 13% after rebrand to Forum Markets
item.description: ETHZilla will now go by Forum in its second rebrand in less than 12 months as it looks to catch a windfall from the hype around tokenization.

item.title: UK security committee chair urges temporary ban on crypto political donations
item.description: The Reform UK party was the first to accept crypto donations in May last year, with leader Nigel Farage announcing the group is accepting Bitcoin and other cryptocurrency contributions.

item.title: Jane Street Speculation Renews Scrutiny of Bitcoin ETF Market Mechanics
item.description: Online claims have drawn attention to how institutional middlemen hedge Bitcoin ETF shares, exposing a gap between inflows and spot buying.

item.title: Anthropic, OpenAI Dial Back Safety Language as AI Race Accelerates
item.description: Reports show both Anthropic and OpenAI are revising safety commitments amid surging investment and competition.

item.description: Nvidia‚Äôs earnings lifted technology shares and steadied broader markets, even as investors weigh how long the AI investment cycle can run.

item.description: Bitcoin markets are bracing for Friday‚Äôs $10.5 billion monthly options expiry. Does the data show bulls or bears at an advantage?

item.title: Bitcoin snaps back near $69,000 but analysts warn the market may not be out of the woods yet
item.description: Crypto rebounds sharply from Tuesday's lows, yet traders question whether the move marks a lasting turn or another range-bound bounce.

item.description: The AI bellwether reported $68 billion revenue last quarter, expecting it to grow to $78 billion next quarter.

item.description: As the Department of Defense pushes for greater AI integration, researchers said the top models chose the nuclear option in nearly all war simulations.

item.title: Kraken introduces fixed-rate crypto loans for its Pro users
item.description: The crypto exchange‚Äôs new Flexline product lets Pro users borrow against digital assets at fixed rates of 10%‚Äì25% APR for terms of up to two years.

item.title: Bitcoin Treasury Company GD Culture May Sell BTC to Buy Back Shares
item.description: Another treasury firm could backtrack on accumulating crypto, with GD Culture eyeing Bitcoin sales as a way to boost its stock price.

item.title: Solo bitcoin miner turns $75 of rented hashrate into a $200,000 block reward
item.description: The miner rented 1 petahash per second through on-demand cloud mining and got lucky on block 938,092, one of 21 solo-mined blocks in the past year.

item.title: Price predictions 2/25: BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, BCH, ADA, HYPE, XMR
item.description: Bitcoin bulls rushed toward $70,000, and ETH reclaimed $2,000 following a drastic improvement in investor sentiment, but will the gains hold?

item.title: MrBeast editor nabbed by prediction market firm Kalshi for alleged insider trading
item.description: The company said it punished the MrBeast employee and another user it said tried to get away with contracts relying on inside information.

item.title: Hut 8 posts $279M Q4 loss despite surge in compute revenue
item.description: The Bitcoin miner's digital asset losses mounted, even as it advanced a 15-year, $7 billion AI data center lease.

item.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana Shorts Get Rekt as BTC Price Rebounds Near $69K
item.description: More than $400 million worth of short positions have been liquidated in the last day as Bitcoin nears $69K and Ethereum and Solana surge.

item.title: Bitcoin tops $69.5K after stocks rebound, strong earnings data boost risk appetite
item.description: Bitcoin rallied above $69,500 after US stocks turned green on US policy clarity and strong earnings results. Will bulls target $70,000 next?

item.title: What early Bitcoin architect Adam Back thinks of this cycle
item.description: Cited in the 2008 Bitcoin white paper, Back argued volatility is typical even as regulatory clarity and institutional access expands.

item.title: Blockfills co-founder and CEO Nicholas Hammer has stepped down
item.description: The crypto lender suspended client deposits and withdrawals earlier this month due to recent market and financial conditions.

item.title: The UK is picking winners for its digital dollar future while Coinbase CEO cries foul
item.description: Coinciding with the FCA‚Äôs announcement of its stablecoin trial, Coinbase‚Äôs Brian Armstrong criticized the U.K.‚Äôs regulatory process, saying it puts the region's global crypto leadership at risk.

item.title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy, Coinbase Among Most-Shorted Stocks: Goldman Sachs
item.description: Top crypto equities like Bitcoin treasury firm Strategy and crypto exchange Coinbase are among the most shorted stocks, says Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Tether invests $200 million in digital marketplace Whop to expand stablecoin payments
item.description: The online marketplace said it will embed Tether's crypto wallet tools and USDT, USAT tokens to power crypto payments for over 18 million users.

item.title: UK Selects Firms for Stablecoin Regulatory Sandbox, Including Revolut
item.description: The four firms will now have free reign to experiment in a program that will inform final UK stablecoin rules set to be released later this year.

item.title: Crypto Long & Short: When ETF options start driving bitcoin
item.description: In this week‚Äôs Crypto Long & Short Newsletter, Gregory Mall of Lionsoul Global on how ETFs have shifted a growing share of bitcoin volatility into U.S. equity options markets.

item.title: A $100 million crypto campaign fund with a pro-Trump vibe so far failed to show up
item.description: The Fellowship political action committee promised $100 million, with reports that Tether may have been tied as a backer, but the fund has so far delivered zero.

item.title: Billionaire Alan Howard‚Äôs crypto incubator WebN closes down
item.description: WebN backed innovative digital asset firms like KAIO, Twinstake, TruFin and Geometry.

item.title: MrBeast Employee Fined, Suspended by Kalshi for Insider Trading on YouTube Videos
item.description: Kalshi revealed its first enforcement actions Wednesday, against a political candidate and an employee of YouTube star MrBeast.

item.title: Bitcoin climbs above $68,500, Circle leads crypto stocks higher, as bounce strengthens
item.description: Ether, solana and dogecoin are among the altcoins posting 10% or more advances.

item.title: Bitcoin treasury firm GD Culture set to sell BTC holdings to fund share buybacks
item.description: The company's stock has lost about two-thirds of its value since peaking last year, nearly in step with bitcoin's record price above $126,000.

item.title: Democrat Senator Launches $1.7B Iran Sanctions Probe Into Binance
item.description: Senator Richard Blumenthal has launched an inquiry into alleged Iran-linked crypto transfers as Binance pushes back against the claims.

item.title: Circle Stock Jumps Double Digits as It Reports 72% Rise in USDC Circulation
item.description: Circle‚Äôs USDC grew 72% in Q4 as transaction volume soared and CRCL stock popped on bullish AI and payments commentary.

item.title: XRP jumps 6% as exchange data points to institutional accumulation
item.description: Break above $1.37 draws strong spot demand, with ETF inflows and retail buying suggesting positioning shift.
